name: Scallywags Pursuit
description:
The captain of The Unsalted Salmon has been taken by the treacherous Navy fleet. Hidden on an island, the cap'n has only one final hope: you.

Take control of the Unsalted Salmon and sail the seas plundering, fighting Navy ships, and searching for your captain. Prepare to embark, sailor.

Developed by Cannonball Works in eight weeks, for the Game Design program. It is one of our very first games developed!

Credits:
Jason Nguyen - Producer
Ramsey Lee - Creative Director
Christopher Guido - Design Lead
Daniel Maher - Sound Designer and Artist
Felix Lam - Programmer
